alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Holt, Boyd and northern Wheeler Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Butte to near O`Neill to 13 miles north of Bartlett. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`neill, Spencer, O`Neill, Ewing, Butte, Lynch, Page, Gross, Inman, Bristow, Anoka, Monowi, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Four Corners, Opportunity, Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Midway, Anncar, Knievels Corner and Buffalo Flats. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 301 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 148 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 110 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
